MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD1 postcode area of Galashiels, affecting properties in Nichol View and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:48am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11am on the 4th January 2021
